name: Turtle's Adventure
description:
Turtle's Adventure

This game is made for the polymars, Sea Jam. This is for #TeamSeas, an initiative to raise awareness for ocean preservation, by raising money to remove 30 Million pounds of trash from the ocean.

This is a fun and rage inducing game, inspired by games like, Getting Over It and Jump King. You follow a turtle and his climb to the surface of a really really really really really deep ocean, but to reach the top you will have to dodge dangerous trash. There is a nice little surprise at the end for anyone who can beat the game. :D
